session.objective: Continue context engineering integration: decompose oversized memories, add size enforcement hooks, update session protocol

handoffRead.evidence: Context carried from prior session via summary

memoryIndex.evidence: memory-index.md read and updated in prior session

memoryUpdate.evidence: Memory files directly modified as part of task scope

markdownLint.evidence: Pre-commit hooks ran markdownlint on all commits

qaValidation.evidence: SKIPPED: investigation-only - memory curation, tooling, and documentation changes

workLog.task: P1a: Remove redundant monolithic memory files
workLog.outcome: Removed 13 files (65K chars): skills-github-cli.md, skills-ci-infrastructure.md, skills-gh-extensions-agent.md, 10 duplicate gh-ext-* files. Updated 4 cross-references.

workLog.task: P1b: Add memory size validation to pre-commit hook
workLog.outcome: Added size validator section that blocks new oversized files and warns on modified ones.
Created .serena/memories/README.md with size constraints, decomposition process, and tooling docs.

workLog.task: P1d: Add memory size to session protocol quality checks
workLog.outcome: Added SHOULD requirement for memory size validation during session end.
Created scripts/memory/detect_stale.py. Found 34 files with broken links, 66 with broken code refs, 0 stale.

workLog.task: P3b: Health dashboard and quarterly curation process
workLog.outcome: Created scripts/memory/memory_health.py. Metrics: 983 memories, 97% size compliance, ~602K tokens. Documented quarterly process in README.

nextSteps: P2a: Create session compaction tool (requires Claude API access, deferred)
P2b: Integrate compaction into session protocol (blocked by P2a)
Decompose remaining 12 oversized memory files (>10K chars) over time
Fix 34 broken memory links and 66 broken code references identified by stale detector
